name: Dyslock
description:
In this mastermind-like puzzle game, you have to find a unique code using several provided clues. Each clue contains a guess for the code and information on how many digits are well-placed and badly-placed.

The game contains a quasi-infinite amount of puzzles, with the number of digits of the code ranging from 2 to 6. Three difficulty categories are provided, each with increasingly more challenging puzzles. You are free to play whichever difficulty you like most.

You can use the build-in tools to take notes when solving a puzzle. When stuck, you can ask for a hint.

Don't forget to claim your daily reward!
